cu.explanation_en: Setting mnc to 999 (exceeds maximum allowed value for 2-digit MNC) will cause PLMN configuration errors and prevent cell identification.

du.explanation_en: Setting zeroCorrelationZoneConfig to 200 (exceeds maximum allowed value) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent PRACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 zeroCorrelationZoneConfig 設定為 200（超過最大允許值）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 PRACH 設定。
